bio: A famed Yo-criminal, and the estranged brother of the Castelius lineage. He always makes people lose, or worse, run away from the finish line!

soultimate.name: No Scope
soultimate.description: Hit nearby foes, allies, and self with lots of damage.

skill.effect: Stamina does not decrease for all allies.
skill.name: Keep on Runnin'

name: Castelilose
